title: Spoon (band)
summary: Spoon is an American rock band from Austin, Texas, formed in 1993. The band has seen many lineup changes throughout their history, with Britt Daniel (vocals, guitar) and Jim Eno (drums) serving as its founding members. Alex Fischel (keyboards, guitar),[1] Gerardo Larios (guitar, keyboards)[2] and Ben Trokan (bass, keyboards)[3] are also currently members of the band. Critics have described the band's musical style as rock,[4][5] pop,[5][6] art rock,[7][8] and experimental rock.[9]
